Title: Arcane Observatory
Game Text: After this card is played, each target deals itself 1 fixed psychic damage and 1 fixed radiant damage. END PHASE 1 Hero may discard 2 cards. If they do, they may either salvage 1 card or destroy 1 Environment Relic card.
Flavor Text: I can feel the bridge between this timeline and many others.

Title: Balov's Clock
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, go back to the START PHASE of the current turn. END PHASE If this card is not in the Environment play area, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: The nature of time is malleable, and this clock -- and its original owner -- understood that nature far better than you or I ever will.
Attribution: Master Xian Niu, Arcane Tales Vol. 2 #540

Title: The Bloodless Reliquary
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by targets in this play area. START PHASE Each target in this play area regains 1 HP. END PHASE Destroy 1 target in this play area with 3 or fewer HP. Then, move this card to the play area with the target with the lowest HP.
Flavor Text: I felt it reaching through my veins, like frost creeping across a window, or vines overtaking ruins. It wanted to control everything I am.

Title: Brigit, the Refugee
Game Text: END PHASE The Hero with the fewest cards in hand draws 1 card. The Hero character with the lowest HP regains 2 HP. Move 1 Relic card from the Environment play area to the play area with the target with the highest HP.
Flavor Text: I clean and care for items of great power. Want to see? They're all quite interesting! I can go get more, if you like.

Title: Diamond Book of Monsters
Game Text: If this card is played or revealed during a Hero turn, put this card in a Hero play area. While this card is in a Hero play area, +1 damage dealt by Hero targets. If this card enters the Villain play area, each Hero character deals themself 2 fixed psychic damage. Then, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: This is your birthright, Faye. Your father kept it from you for so long, but the truth is now yours to act upon.

Title: The Edifice of Respite
Game Text: Whenever an Ongoing card in this play area would be destroyed, prevent that destruction and put 1 token on this card. When this card is destroyed, bury 1 Hero Ongoing card, 1 Villain Ongoing card, and 1 Environment Ongoing card. END PHASE If there are 2 or more tokens on this card, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: They say he never wanted to be far from his creations. Now, he resides within them forever.

Title: Frictionless Coffer
Game Text: After a Villain target is destroyed, put it under this card if there are no cards under this card. START PHASE If this card is in a Hero play area, bury the card under this card. If this card is in a Villain play area, play the card under this card.
Flavor Text: Careful, Pete. I mean, gotta be careful with everything in this place, but that looks like something we don't want to break.

Title: Kuranchu, the Groundskeeper
Game Text: After this card is played, discover 1 Relic card, playing it in the Hero play area with the fewest cards. END PHASE Each Hero may discard any number of cards. If (H) cards are discarded this way, move an Environment Relic card from one play area to another.
Flavor Text: Watch where yer walkin'! Stay outta the cucumber patch! People got no respect for the hard work I put in around this place.
Attribution: Kuranchu, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 4 #14

Title: Locke, the Afflicted
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to this card by targets with fewer HP than this card. END PHASE If there are any Relic cards in the Villain play area, this card deals the target with the highest HP 3 melee damage.
Flavor Text: You gotta set me free. Don't worry! You think a werewolf hunter like me is gonna let a little bite get to me? Not a chance!

Title: Maddening Layout
Game Text: Discover 1 Ongoing card. Discover 1 Relic card, playing it in the Villain play area.
Flavor Text: Babe, where'd you go? I thought I took a left turn at the top of the stairs, but there was just a wall there! Are the walls moving?

Title: Mystic Library
Game Text: After this card is played, reveal the top card of each non-Environment deck in turn order. Play any Ongoing cards revealed this way. Discard the other revealed cards. END PHASE Discover 1 Ongoing card from the deck in the play area with the fewest cards in play.
Flavor Text: NightMist always says that more time in study is a good thing. I'm just branching out on what kinds of things I'm studying!

Title: Prison of the Inner Eye
Game Text: START PHASE If there are no targets in this play area with 5 or fewer HP, move this card to the play area with the target with the lowest HP. END PHASE Each target in this play area deals itself 2 fixed psychic damage. Then, move this card to the play area with the target with the lowest HP.
Flavor Text: What's this? That stellar beast must have done more of a number on me than I thought! Maybe I'll go take a quick lie down...

Title: Reagent Garden
Game Text: After this card is played, each target regains 2 HP. END PHASE 1 Hero may discard up to 3 cards. For each card they discard this way, 1 target regains 2 HP.
Flavor Text: Now, Faye, you know as well as I do that tanacetum parthenium is just a fancy name for feverfew, and that it's perfectly safe as a tea.
Attribution: The Scholar, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 2 #230

Title: Relic Room
Game Text: After this card is played, move 1 Environment Relic card in play to the Villain play area. END PHASE Discover 1 Relic card. 1 Hero character may deal themself 3 fixed psychic damage. If they take damage this way, move 1 Relic card from the Environment play area to their play area.
Flavor Text: My, my. I'm certain NightMist would be mortified to learn that someone with ill intent was in her home while she was indisposed.
Attribution: The Seer, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 2 #350

Title: Caspit's "Playground"
Game Text: Hero Ongoing cards gain the keyword "Item".
Flavor Text: Quiet! In fact, I'd recommend staying out entirely. I'm... creating.

Title: Dr. Stinson's Secondary Lab
Game Text: END PHASE Each Hero reveals the top card of their deck and either discards it or replaces it.
Flavor Text: Sure, I could get to the Eaken-Rubendall labs in a few seconds, but sometimes I don't have a few seconds. Plus, no one touches my stuff here.

Title: Entry Point
Game Text: After this card is played, destroy 1 Room card. +1 damage dealt by Villain targets.
Flavor Text: You thought you'd be safe in here? Bad news: the Fright Train is pulling into the station! All aboard!

Title: Freedom Security Staff
Game Text: This card counts as a Hero target. It is immune to damage dealt by Hero targets. START PHASE 1 Hero may discard 2 cards. If they do, destroy 1 Environment card. END PHASE This card deals the Villain target with the highest HP 2 lightning damage.
Flavor Text: Seriously, why does this place even need security? It's a building full of heroes! After one more round of patrols, I'm taking the rest of the night off.

Title: The Front Desk
Game Text: END PHASE Play the top card of the Environment deck.
Flavor Text: Welcome to the new Freedom Five headquarters! We're here to help. What can we do for you today?

Title: Frost's Cryo Chamber
Game Text: After an Item card is destroyed, the associated Hero draws 1 card. END PHASE Each target deals itself 1 fixed cold damage.
Flavor Text: Better comfortable in here than bored out there.

Title: Ironclad Maintenance Bay
Game Text: END PHASE Each Hero may salvage 1 Item card.
Flavor Text: Don't mind me, folks. Just here to do another quick diagnostic on everything. Pull up the charts from yesterday, just to compare.

Title: Legacy's Landing Pad
Game Text: END PHASE 1 Hero may collect 1 Ongoing card.
Flavor Text: Yeah, Dad, I know how to fly. I've been flying for years. I very rarely mess up and fly through solid objects!

Title: Medical Ward
Game Text: END PHASE Each target regains 1 HP.
Flavor Text: These medical bots are great, but did they have to be quite so... pink? I mean, I know that's your thing and all, but still.

Title: Mission Control
Game Text: END PHASE Each Hero reveals the top card of their deck. If the revealed card is a One-Shot card, discard that card. Otherwise, play it.
Flavor Text: Good morning, heroes! Another big day today, and there's no one I'd rather spend it with! Ready to get started?

Title: Training Simulator
Game Text: END PHASE Discover 1 target from the Villain deck. Then, 1 Hero may use 1 power.
Flavor Text: Well, well... another one? Quite the punishing training session, indeed! Only way to improve!

Title: The Wraith's Arsenal
Game Text: END PHASE Each Hero may draw 1 card. If all Heroes draw cards this way, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: That's the issue with projectiles. I'm constantly throwing away all my best stuff. I have to carry lots of extras.

Title: Cornered Ankylosaurus
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to this card. END PHASE This card deals the 2 targets other than itself with the highest HP 3 melee damage.
Flavor Text: You think your armored hide will protect you? The fires of Ra cannot be extinguished!

Title: Dinosaur Stampede
Game Text: Shuffle the Environment trash into the Environment deck. Discover 2 Dinosaur cards. Each Dinosaur card deals each non-Environment target 1 fixed melee damage.
Flavor Text: Don't look now, but there are quite a few of those massive beasts headed this way at a concerning clip. I advise running, rather than looking!

Title: Enraged T. Rex
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals the target other than itself with the second lowest HP 5 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Hey! Big fella! Why don't you pick on someone who's at least a bit closer to your own size!
Attribution: Haka, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 2 #344

Title: Grazing Stegosaurus
Game Text: START PHASE The Hero with the fewest cards in hand draws 1 card. END PHASE This card deals the target other than itself with the second highest HP 2 melee damage.
Flavor Text: If we can pass this way without disturbing the creature, it should not bother us. Unless something provokes it, of course.
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Prime Wardens Vol. 1 #2

Title: Imminent Eruption
Game Text: END PHASE If this card has 10 or more HP, play the top card of the environment deck. If this card has 9 or fewer HP, this card deals each target other than itself X fire damage, where X is the current HP of this card. If this card is at 0 HP, shuffle it into the Environment deck.
Flavor Text: Behold! This land you dare to tread upon shall be your undoing! You never should have trespassed on my island.

Title: Primordial Plant Life
Game Text: Each target regains 1 HP. The non-Environment target with the lowest HP deals itself 3 fixed toxic damage.
Flavor Text: Do watch your step. The prehistoric creatures aren't the only dangers lurking in this jungle.

Title: Pterodactyl Thief
Game Text: START PHASE Destroy 1 Item card. Put cards destroyed this way under this card. END PHASE This card deals the target other than itself with the highest HP X sonic damage, where X is the number of cards under this card plus 1.
Flavor Text: Something about the glint of my blade has drawn this creature to me! Back, back! Your grasping talons will find no purchase here!

Title: River of Lava
Game Text: If Imminent Eruption is not in play, summon Imminent Eruption. Imminent Eruption deals each target other than itself 2 fire damage.
Flavor Text: A part of the world as old as I am. Not only for regrowing, this is a place of great destruction. Things are born and end in flame here.

Title: Velociraptor Pack
Game Text: +2 damage dealt by this card for each other Velociraptor Pack card in play. END PHASE This card deals the non-Velociraptor Pack target with the lowest HP 2 melee damage.
Flavor Text: I have encountered many bizarre creatures on this strange planet, yet few quite so clever as these.

Title: Crystal Collector
Game Text: START PHASE This card deals the 3 targets with the highest HP 1 fire damage each. END PHASE Each Hero may discard 1 Magma Crystal card. Each Hero that does draws 3 cards.
Flavor Text: It's not just that you're hungry. I understand. You're gathering resources for all of your people.

Title: Crystalloid Behemoth
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, put it in 1 Hero's hand. This card cannot be played from a Hero's hand. START PHASE This card deals each target other than itself 1 fire damage. END PHASE This card deals the target other than itself with the highest HP 4 melee damage.
Flavor Text: This terrifying beast must never be allowed to attack the surface world again! It's a great enough threat here, miles under the city.

Title: Crystalloid Gremlins
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, put it in 1 Hero's hand. This card cannot be played from a Hero's hand. END PHASE This card deals the 3 non-Environment targets with the lowest HP 1 melee damage and 1 fire damage each.
Flavor Text: Enough, you meddling whelps! Foolish creatures! Stand not before Ra!
Attribution: Ra, Ra: God of the Sun #125

Title: Ember Shaman
Game Text: START PHASE This card deals the 3 targets with the highest HP 1 fire damage each. END PHASE Each Hero may discard 1 Magma Crystal card. Any Hero that does may use 1 power.
Flavor Text: These shaman lead by controlling the crystals. A simple twist to a crystal's energy will give me control of all of them!

Title: Fiery Crystallization
Game Text: Item cards gain the keyword "Magma Crystal". START PHASE The Magmarian card with the highest HP deals each non-Environment target X fire damage and destroys X Item cards, where X is the number of Magmarian cards in play. Move each Item card destroyed this way to its Hero's hand.
Flavor Text: Hey! That's not just some piece of metal! I take back all the nice things I said about you. Jerks.

Title: Inner Core Tunneler
Game Text: Whenever a Hero character would be dealt damage, they may discard 1 Magma Crystal card. If they do, redirect that damage to this card. START PHASE This card deals the 3 targets with the highest HP 1 fire damage each.
Flavor Text: Careful there, you large and fiery chap! It's hot enough as it is! We're not interested in your incredibly hot crystals. No, thank you!

Title: Magmarian Throng
Game Text: Discover 2 Magmarian cards. Each Magmarian card deals each non-Environment target 1 fire damage.
Flavor Text: Thank you for your very warm welcome. A bit too warm, if you ask me. Any chance you could turn down the heat?

Title: Seismic Defender
Game Text: START PHASE This card deals the target with the highest HP 2 fire damage. END PHASE Each Hero may discard 1 Magma Crystal card. This card deals the X Villain targets with the highest HP 3 melee damage and 3 fire damage each, where X is the number of Magma Crystal cards discarded.
Flavor Text: Oh, I like this one! A great companion in combat, but also an ancient soul. They are as old as the stones themselves!

Title: Stone Shaper
Game Text: START PHASE This card deals the 3 targets with the highest HP 1 fire damage each. END PHASE Each hero may discard 1 Magma Crystal card to select 1 target. -1 damage dealt to selected targets until the Environment turn START PHASE.
Flavor Text: In your own way, you sing through stones and conduct lava in deep music. This is something older than the magics I have felt.
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Prime Wardens Vol. 1 #122

Title: Bank Heist In Progress
Game Text: On each Hero's START PHASE, that Hero may skip to their DRAW PHASE. After a Hero does so, destroy this card. START PHASE Each Hero discards 1 card. Play the top card of the Villain deck. Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: They still don't know I'm here. I'll take out as many as I can, but if this goes sideways, I'm going to need a hand.

Title: Bomb at City Hall
Game Text: START PHASE This card deals each non-Environment target 3 fire damage. Each Hero character deals itself 3 fixed psychic damage. Each Hero discards 2 cards. Destroy this card. END PHASE 1 Hero may discard 2 Item cards. If they do, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Heroes! Come at once! There's some sort of terrible contraption here at City Hall, and it's ticking!

Title: Burning High Rise
Game Text: START PHASE This card deals each Hero target 2 fire damage. Each Hero character deals itself 2 fixed psychic damage. Destroy this card. END PHASE Each Hero may discard any number of cards. If (H) plus 2 cards are discarded this way, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: I've been through the whole place twice, but I know there are still people inside. A woman was yelling for help and something about her baby! We gotta get back in there.

Title: Bustling City
Game Text: In turn order, reveal the top card of each deck. If the revealed card is a One-Shot card, discard it. Otherwise, play it.
Flavor Text: This city is a constant headache. Lights, noise, people, traffic. Worst place I've ever lived. Couldn't imagine living anywhere else.

Title: Collateral Damage
Game Text: Destroy 1 Villain Ongoing card, 1 Hero Ongoing card, and 1 Environment card. Each target deals itself 1 fixed psychic damage.
Flavor Text: Drive them back! We're risking the lives of millions with every second we spend fighting in this city!

Title: Hostage Situation
Game Text: START PHASE Each Hero destroys 1 of their Item cards. Each Hero discards 1 card. Destroy this card. END PHASE 1 Hero may discard 2 One-Shot cards. If they do, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Seems like you've found yourselves in a sticky situation! Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!!!

Title: Impending Casualty
Game Text: START PHASE Each Hero character deals itself 3 fixed psychic damage. Destroy this card. END PHASE 1 Hero may discard their hand. If they do, they draw 2 cards, then destroy this card.
Flavor Text: I believe you'll find the solution is further down, and several more across!

Title: Local Legal Expert
Game Text: This card counts as a Hero target. It is immune to damage dealt by Hero targets. END PHASE Each Hero draws 1 card.
Flavor Text: He could have gotten off scot-free if his legal team hadn't overlooked those torts. That's why they call me the Law Hawk. I don't overlook anything.
Attribution: Brianna Hawke, Esq., Freedom Five Annual #8

Title: Persistent Paparazzi
Game Text: After a Hero uses a power, they deal themself 1 fixed psychic damage. START PHASE Each Hero may discard 1 card. If each active Hero does so, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: I'm live at the scene, reporting on the incident in progress. What's really going on here, Setback? What are you heroes hiding?

Title: Plummeting Monorail
Game Text: START PHASE This card deals the 2 non-Environment targets with the highest HP 5 melee damage each. Destroy this card. END PHASE 1 Hero may deal themself 2 fixed psychic damage and 2 fixed melee damage. If they do, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Just one chance to get this right. I have to slow it down before it reaches the ground, but without hurting anyone inside!
Attribution: Legacy, A Day in the Life: Legacy

Title: Police Backup
Game Text: This card counts as a Hero target. It is immune to damage dealt by Hero targets. END PHASE This card deals the Villain target with the highest HP 1 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: You're the finest buncha boys in blue I've ever had the privilege of working with. There are some real heavy hitters out there, so be on your guard!
Attribution: Police Chief Callahan, Freedom Five Annual #3

Title: Biomimetic Plasma Vat
Game Text: After this card is dealt damage, it deals each non-Environment target 1 fixed toxic damage. Then, the attacker regains (H) HP. When this card is destroyed, destroy (H) minus 2 Ongoing cards.
Flavor Text: So many potential tools... Why deal with a team of flawed people pretending to be heroes, when you can just build your own?

Title: Chemical Explosion
Game Text: Discover 1 Vat card. Each non-Environment target deals itself X fixed toxic damage, where X is the number of Vat cards in play. Then, destroy each Vat card.
Flavor Text: What a mess. To avoid the cliche, I am not going to say that there is no way for her to have survived the explosion, but it does seem doubtful.

Title: Escaped Lab Rat
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals the (H) minus 2 non-Rat targets with the lowest HP 1 melee damage each.
Flavor Text: See, this is why I prefer robots. Experiment goes bad? Just take them apart and rebuild them. None of this gross stuff.

Title: Experimental Mutagen
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by Rat cards. Rat cards are immune to toxic damage. START PHASE Discover 1 Rat card.
Flavor Text: Uh, I think it used to be a rat. Try not to get any of that green stuff on you, unless you want to share a similar fate.

Title: Imperfect Human Specimen
Game Text: After this card is played, each Hero target deals itself 1 fixed psychic damage. END PHASE This card deals the non-Environment target with the lowest HP 3 melee damage. Then, this card regains 3 HP.
Flavor Text: Not all failures are wastes. Flush out the system, and be sure to fully dispose of any organic material. They have a way of hanging around.

Title: Irradiated Cyclohexane Vat
Game Text: After this card is dealt damage, it deals each non-Environment target 1 fixed energy damage. Then, destroy 1 Ongoing card and discover 1 Ongoing card from the destroyed card's deck. When this card is destroyed, this card deals each non-Environment target 2 energy damage.
Flavor Text: We need to move. I can feel the radiation rolling off these tanks.

Title: Mutated Sewer Rat
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals the (H) non-Rat targets with the highest HP 2 toxic damage each.
Flavor Text: Yer not the feller I'm lookin' for, but I reckon you may well be able to point me in his direction.

Title: Supercooled Trisolvent Vat
Game Text: After this card is dealt damage, it deals each non-Environment target 1 fixed cold damage. Then, destroy 1 target with 1 HP. When this card is destroyed, destroy 1 Item or Ongoing card in each play area.
Flavor Text: Hoooo boy that's cold! Aww, this stuff makes my blorpy bits go all brittle... No thank you to ice on my beautiful perfect body!

Title: Buffeting Ephemeral Winds
Game Text: After this card is played, destroy all other Distortion cards. -1 damage dealt by all targets.
Flavor Text: The winds, they drive me back! Our challenge must wait for yet another day, my little cherub.

Title: Claustrophobic Delusion
Game Text: After this card is played, destroy all other Distortion cards. Each target is immune to damage, except for the Hero target with the lowest HP and the Villain target with the lowest HP.
Flavor Text: Ach, this place is makin' me feel a touch peely-wally, if ye know what I mean!

Title: Explosive Bubbles
Game Text: When this card is dealt damage, reduce that damage to 1. END PHASE This card deals the 3 non-Environment targets with the highest HP X energy damage each, where X is the current HP of this card.
Flavor Text: I must take care not to disturb these seemingly innocuous bubbles. The slightest brush could spell certain death!

Title: Ghostly Images
Game Text: After this card is played, destroy all other Distortion cards. END PHASE Reveal the bottom card of each non-Environment deck in turn order. If the revealed card is a One-Shot card, play it. Otherwise, discard it.
Flavor Text: These shadows of heroes who once were are nothing more than lost stories. Some legends are destined to remain mere memories.
Attribution: Grimm, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 4 #11

Title: Miasma of Pain
Game Text: After this card is played, destroy all other Distortion cards. END PHASE The (H) targets with the highest HP deal themselves 2 fixed infernal damage each.
Flavor Text: Some people been dealing with pain they whole lives. Others? Still new to it.
Attribution: Rambler, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 4 #82

Title: The Oracle of Discord
Game Text: After this card is played, the Heroes may replace 1 active Hero character card with a different character card for that same Hero, setting it to its maximum HP. Otherwise, this card deals each target 2 psychic damage. END PHASE Discover 1 Ongoing card from the deck in the play area with the target with the lowest HP.
Flavor Text: Show me what I want to see, oh great Oracle. I demand you give me what I deserve!

Title: Pervasive Frailty
Game Text: After this card is played, destroy all other Distortion cards. +1 damage dealt to all targets.
Flavor Text: Hah, you're going to try punching me again? Don't you remember what happened last ti-- oof!!

Title: Portal Fiend
Game Text: START PHASE This card deals the non-Environment target with the second highest HP 3 psychic damage. END PHASE Reveal the top card of the Environment deck. If it is a Distortion card, play it. Otherwise, discard it and this card regains (H) HP.
Flavor Text: What an astounding creature! Upon making eye contact, I was transported to a locale unknown, though still within this accursed realm.

Title: Positive Energy Field
Game Text: After this card is played, destroy all other Distortion cards. END PHASE The (H) targets with the lowest HP regain 2 HP each.
Flavor Text: We obviously can't keep fighting. What do you say, old foe? Shall we sit down and... talk it out?

Title: Reversed Gravity
Game Text: After this card is played, destroy all other Distortion cards. After a target is played, it deals itself 2 fixed melee damage. END PHASE Each Hero discards 1 card.
Flavor Text: Eek! I can't fly! Huginn, Muninn-- help me!

Title: Spinning Vortex
Game Text: After this card is played, destroy all other Distortion cards. END PHASE Destroy 1 Hero Ongoing card and 1 Villain Ongoing card. Each non-Environment target deals itself 1 fixed sonic damage.
Flavor Text: Obey me! Realm, if you turn against me now, your suffering will be your undoing! I am the master here, and no other!

Title: Time Crawls
Game Text: After this card is played, destroy all other Distortion cards. During each Hero turn, that Hero must skip either their PLAY PHASE or their POWER PHASE. During the Villain turn, skip the first END PHASE effect that would occur.
Flavor Text: The faster I try to run, the more this force pushes against me! I'll have to slow all the way down to make any progress at all.

Title: Time Flies
Game Text: After this card is played, destroy all other Distortion cards. Heroes may play 1 additional card during their PLAY PHASE and draw 1 additional card during their DRAW PHASE. END PHASE Play the top card of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: I can't tell if I'm moving faster or the world is moving slower, but I feel like I'm about to vibrate out of my skin!

Title: Ambitious Racketeer
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, destroy 1 Hero Ongoing card. END PHASE Each Hero may discard 1 card. This card deals each Hero character X projectile damage, where X is (H) minus the number of cards discarded this way.
Flavor Text: The most dangerous evil is barely evil at all. It's one man stepping on another to get ahead. It's forgetting to look down when you're moving up.

Title: Anti-Hero Sentiment
Game Text: After an Environment target is played, 1 Hero discards 2 cards. END PHASE Each Environment target deals the Hero target with the highest HP 1 sonic damage.
Flavor Text: Costumed vigilantes running wild in our streets, filling the heads of our children with dangerous ideas, while doing nothing to protect us!

Title: Bruce Watkins
Game Text: If there are any Smear cards in play, this card is immune to damage. When this card is destroyed, discover 1 Smear card. END PHASE Discover 1 Smear card.
Flavor Text: Werewolves, Bruce? Give me a break. What'll you come up with next-- a giant man-eating rat in the sewers?

Title: Despair and Decay
Game Text: START PHASE Each target deals itself 1 fixed psychic damage. END PHASE If there are no Bystander cards in play, discover 1 Environment target.
Flavor Text: This city preys on the people who live here, and they prey on each other. There's no cleaning up this town -- just surviving it.

Title: Dr. Tremata
Game Text: When this card would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to a Hero target. When this card is destroyed, each Villain target regains (H) HP. END PHASE Each Hero draws 1 card.
Flavor Text: Irregular lacerations. Overactive toxicity in the wound. You bring me the most interesting conundrums. I just wish they came with less viscera.

Title: Mayor Overbrook
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, play the top card of the Environment deck. END PHASE Discard the top card of each Hero deck. The Villain target with the lowest HP regains (H) HP.
Flavor Text: They call him 'The Barber', because he's always taking a little off the top.

Title: Media Pressure
Game Text: After a Villain target is played, each Hero character deals themself 1 fixed psychic damage. END PHASE Each Hero discards 1 card.
Flavor Text: We step out and fight crime? We're publicly derided as dangers to society. We mind our own business? We're letting the city down. We can't win.

Title: Pernicious Propaganda
Game Text: START PHASE Discard the top card of each Hero deck. If any keywords on the discarded card match any keywords on cards in the associated Hero's hand, they discard 1 of those cards as well. END PHASE Each Hero character deals themself 1 fixed psychic damage.
Flavor Text: Print media, television, and radio, even this new World Wide Web! All tools for suppressing and coercing the masses.

Title: Street Gang
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, destroy 1 Item card. END PHASE This card deals each target other than itself 1 projectile damage and 1 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Looks like the Venom Demons are recruiting again. Where do these punks come up with this stuff?

Title: Thiago Diaz
Game Text: When this card would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to a Hero target. When this card is destroyed, each Hero target deals itself 3 fixed psychic damage. END PHASE 1 Hero may use 1 power.
Flavor Text: You can't give up! I know things look bad, but even in the face of the worst danger, you stand for what's right. That's what makes you heroes.

Title: Tony Taurus
Game Text: When this card would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to a Hero target. When this card is destroyed, each Hero discards 1 card. END PHASE 1 Hero may discard 1 card. If they do, destroy 1 Ongoing card.
Flavor Text: This is a business transaction: you're gonna tell me what I want to know. I'm going to not commit any unnecessary violence. Sound good?

Title: Urban Blight
Game Text: After this card is played, discover 1 Smear card. END PHASE Each Hero character deals themself X fixed psychic damage, where X is the number of Smear cards in play.
Flavor Text: You think anyone notices when someone goes missing? People disappear every day. This city can swallow a soul without a trace. I'm just here to help.

Title: Atlantean Font of Power
Game Text: START PHASE Each Hero may discard 1 card. If each active Hero does so, destroy this card. END PHASE Play the top card of the Villain deck. Play the top card of each Hero deck in turn order.
Flavor Text: This vessel houses a spirit of judgment. It has been called to a higher purpose. No mortal weakness remains.
Attribution: Fanatic, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #200

Title: The Crucible
Game Text: After this card is played, put the top card of each deck under it. END PHASE Randomly select 1 card under this card. Each target associated with that card's deck deals itself 3 fixed psychic damage. Then, play the selected card.
Flavor Text: We may not have meant to take on these tests, but it seems there is no turning back now.

Title: Flailing Kraken Limb
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals the non-Environment target with the lowest HP 5 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Stop trembling, you weak-willed fools! There are no remaining living creatures here. Just old abandoned ruins.

Title: Hallway Collapse
Game Text: Each target deals itself 2 fixed melee damage. Destroy 1 Environment card.
Flavor Text: Blade is getting away! But if I let go of these rocks, this whole place could come down!

Title: Leaking Room
Game Text: -1 to all damage dealt. START PHASE 1 Hero may discard 1 Item card. If they do, destroy this card. END PHASE Each Hero discards 1 card. Discard the top card of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: You think of that stick as the source of your powers, but I tell you: it is a cage. You are enslaved by it. Cast it away.
Attribution: Apostate, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #200

Title: Mystically Defended Hall
Game Text: After this card is played, destroy all Environment targets in play. START PHASE 1 Hero may discard 2 Ongoing cards. If they do, destroy this card. END PHASE Destroy 1 Villain Ongoing card. Destroy 1 Hero Ongoing card.
Flavor Text: I have never more plainly felt the warding presence of magic. Whoever left these here meant them as an undeniable warning: do not enter.
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Prime Wardens Vol. 2 #3

Title: Phosphorescent Chamber
Game Text: +1 to all damage dealt. +1 to all HP recovery. START PHASE Each Hero may discard 1 card. If each active Hero does so, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: The marine plant-life growing here... It has properties unlike anything I have seen on any planet. It is undoubtedly aware of our presence.

Title: The Pillars of Hercules
Game Text: Heroes may play 1 additional card during their PLAY PHASE, use 1 additional power during their POWER PHASE, and draw 1 additional card during their DRAW PHASE. START PHASE Play the top 2 cards of the Villain deck.
Flavor Text: You understand so little of what you cannot see. I have mastered this mystical location with the power of science!

Title: Ravenous Kraken Maw
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to this card. END PHASE This card deals the non-Environment target with the highest HP 3 melee damage and 3 toxic damage.
Flavor Text: Steady on, big fellow. No need for all this ruckus. And I'd just as soon not be your supper today.

Title: Ritual Sanctum
Game Text: After any Hero deals fire, cold, lightning, infernal, or radiant damage, add 1 token to this card. END PHASE If there are at least 10 tokens on this card, each Hero draws 3 cards and uses 1 power. Then, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: The power here is yearning to be released. In my experience, that is rarely a good sign. But, then, nothing ventured, nothing gained!
Attribution: The Scholar, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 2 #8

Title: Subaquatic Exploration
Game Text: Discover 2 Ongoing cards. Each Hero draws 1 card.
Flavor Text: If I hadn't been inside, I wouldn't believe it. Just looks like a bunch of broken buildings out here. No way there's that much preserved space.

Title: Apprentice Poisoner
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals the 3 non-Environment targets with the lowest HP 1 toxic damage each. Until the Environment START PHASE, -1 damage dealt by targets dealt damage this way.
Flavor Text: The toxins do more than taint my blood! I cannot raise a hand against Zhu Long so long as they run through my system.

Title: Mysterious Ceremonies
Game Text: START PHASE Reveal the top card of the Environment deck. If it is a target, discard it. Otherwise, play it. END PHASE 1 Hero may shuffle their trash into their deck, draw 3 cards, or play 1 card. Then, 1 Hero may discard 3 cards. If they do, destroy 1 Ritual card.
Flavor Text: This magic does not follow the paths I am used to. It is not of nature, nor of blood, nor of the Void. It seems a discipline far... older.

Title: Oni Berserker
Game Text: END PHASE This card deals the 2 non-Environment targets with the highest HP 3 melee damage each. Then, this card deals itself and each non-Environment target 1 infernal damage.
Flavor Text: Oh geeze! Uh, watch out, everyone! These guys are strong. And they're real mad, too!

Title: Pool of Revival
Game Text: END PHASE The Heroes may flip an incapacitated Hero character card, restore it to 8 HP, then shuffle and return all of that Hero's deck to the game. If they do, that Hero draws 2 cards, each other Hero discards 2 cards, then destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Your friend? I know who you speak of, but I don't know that I could call him your friend. Does he recognize you at all?

Title: Resurrection Rites
Game Text: After a non-character Villain target is destroyed, put it under this card. END PHASE If a Dragon Master card is in play, randomly select 1 card from under this card and play it.
Flavor Text: The Dragon Master invests in measures of life and death, but he keeps his thumb on the scale.
Attribution: Mr. Fixer, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #4

Title: Service of Service
Game Text: END PHASE The non-Environment target with the lowest HP deals the (H) minus 2 non-Environment targets with the highest HP 2 melee damage each.
Flavor Text: That creep picked the wrong weak-willed fool to take advantage of today. He's going down.

Title: Shinobi Assassin
Game Text: After this card is played, it deals the non-Environment target with the lowest HP 2 melee damage. When this card would be destroyed, move it to the top of an active Hero's deck instead. END PHASE This card deals the non-Environment target with the second lowest HP 2 melee damage.
Flavor Text: Hold. I don't hear anything.

Title: Temple Trials
Game Text: After this card is played, put the top card of each Hero deck under this card. END PHASE Reveal the top card of the Villain deck. If it is a target, play it. Otherwise, discard it and destroy 1 card from under this card. Then, if there are no cards under this card, play the top card of each Hero deck in turn order. Then, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Even with the vast powers we each command, we cannot merely overwhelm the capacity of Zhu Long. We must find another way!
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Arcane Tales Vol. 2 #539

Title: The True Form
Game Text: After Zhu Long is played, bury this card. After a target is destroyed by damage dealt by this card, play the top card of the Environment deck. END PHASE This card deals the target other than itself with the second highest HP 3 radiant damage and 3 toxic damage.
Flavor Text: You know the old saying, appearances can be deceiving? Sometimes, appearances are all you need to know to understand the truth.
Attribution: The Scholar, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 2 #140

Title: Unbreakable Bargain
Game Text: After this card is played, each Villain character card regains (H) HP. Then, the (H) Villain targets with the lowest HP each regain (H) HP. -1 damage dealt to Environment targets.
Flavor Text: Calm yourself, Mr. Pike. We had a deal. Payment is required, and lo, it has already been collected.

Title: Zhu Long
Game Text: After The True Form is played, destroy all Ritual cards and bury this card. When this card is destroyed, discover The True Form. END PHASE Discover 1 Ritual card.
Flavor Text: He's some sort of ancient wizard. Prides himself on being enigmatic and unreadable. It's all quite an act, but there's no denying his power.

Title: Biosphere
Game Text: After this card is played, each Hero target regains 1 HP. START PHASE 1 Hero may discard 1 Item card. If they do, they play 1 card.
Flavor Text: You're probably thinking you've got me fooled. Maybe. But maybe I've got you right where I want you...

Title: Decompression Protocol
Game Text: All targets are immune to damage. On each Hero's START PHASE, that Hero may skip to their DRAW PHASE. If they do, destroy this card. START PHASE If there are 2 or more Dome cards in play, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: And there we are. The lock down. Right on schedule.

Title: Hangar Bay
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, each target deals itself 1 fixed psychic damage. START PHASE 1 Hero may discard 1 Item card. If they do, that Hero collects 1 card.
Flavor Text: No time to talk; everyone into the ship! I mean, I have plenty of time to talk, but you all need to get moving!

Title: Living Quarters
Game Text: After this card is played, each Hero may draw 1 card. START PHASE 1 Hero may discard 1 Ongoing card. If they do, they draw 2 cards.
Flavor Text: The Wagner Mars Base has every amenity the modern space man could hope for, providing comfort while hard at work on the Red Planet!

Title: Medical Bay
Game Text: +1 to all HP recovery. START PHASE 1 Hero may discard 1 Ongoing card. If they do, 1 Hero target regains 3 HP.
Flavor Text: Give me the bad news, Dr. Bortnik. I know I've got this space pox or whatever it is you're calling it. But can it be cured?

Title: Meteor Strike
Game Text: Destroy 1 Villain Ongoing card, 1 Hero Ongoing card, and 1 Environment Ongoing card. Destroy 1 Dome card.
Flavor Text: This is why we always have a back-up. Get the secondary gene-binding facility online, and start building another!
Attribution: Grand Warlord Voss, Cosmic Tales Vol. 2 #203

Title: Oxygen Leak
Game Text: The 3 targets with the highest HP deal themselves 3 fixed toxic damage each. Destroy 1 Dome card.
Flavor Text: Och, this is not how I thought I'd go out. A damn shame.

Title: Power and Engineering
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, also destroy 1 other Dome card. START PHASE 1 Hero may discard 1 card. If they do, play 1 Dome card from the Environment trash.
Flavor Text: Careful, team! If something goes wrong in here, the chain reaction will be catastrophic!

Title: Red Dust Storm
Game Text: Destroy (H) minus 1 Item cards. Destroy 1 Dome card.
Flavor Text: For you, your guns are offline. That's sad and all. My stakes are a bit higher over here.

Title: Security Station
Game Text: START PHASE 1 Hero may discard 1 One-Shot card. If they do, they deal 1 target 3 energy damage. END PHASE Reveal the top card of the Environment deck and the Villain deck. Play any revealed Ongoing cards. Discard the other revealed cards.
Flavor Text: Control established. Processes rerouted. Uploading Omnitron code to mainframe now.

Title: Self-Destruct Sequence
Game Text: On each Hero's START PHASE, that Hero may skip to their POWER PHASE. After a Hero does so, they put 1 card from their hand under this card. START PHASE If there are 0 cards under this card, the Wagner Mars Base explodes. Game Over. Otherwise, destroy 1 card under this card.
Flavor Text: Hey, whoa, uh, I haven't completed my certification on self-destruction sequences yet. Anyone have a manual for this thing?

Title: Space Science Lab
Game Text: +1 to all salvaging. START PHASE 1 Hero may discard 1 One-Shot card. If they do, they discover 1 Item or Ongoing card.
Flavor Text: It somehow survived on that blasted rock of a world. Maybe we could use it to solve world hunger? Something good, certainly.
